Entries.DialogueText: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Harvey, the local doctor.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Harvey, the local doctor.

Entries.DialogueText: I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Thank you very much! I didn't expect anyone to know it was my birthday today. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Thank you very much! I didn't expect anyone to know it was my birthday today.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! It's a... well, it's something. I didn't expect anyone to know it was my birthday today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! It's a... well, it's something. I didn't expect anyone to know it was my birthday today.

Entries.DialogueText: You're giving me this? I'm honored. Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're giving me this? I'm honored. Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! You... want to dance with me? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! You... want to dance with me?

Entries.DialogueText: ...Yes. I'd love to! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Yes. I'd love to!

Entries.DialogueText: I brought some medical supplies, just in case. Be careful out there!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I brought some medical supplies, just in case. Be careful out there!

Entries.DialogueText: The first time this happened, we were all worried that the rain might be dangerous.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The first time this happened, we were all worried that the rain might be dangerous.

Entries.DialogueText: But what if it's actually healthy for the body? Who knows... The plants seem to respond well to it, at least.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But what if it's actually healthy for the body? Who knows... The plants seem to respond well to it, at least.

Entries.DialogueText: It's for me? Thank you! This will be fantastic drizzled on some pasta. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's for me? Thank you! This will be fantastic drizzled on some pasta.

Entries.DialogueText: For me? What a gift! This looks fantastic! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: For me? What a gift! This looks fantastic!

Entries.DialogueText: You know, on a physiological level, I wouldn't advise the consumption of alcohol...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, on a physiological level, I wouldn't advise the consumption of alcohol...

Entries.DialogueText: But there's no denying the benefit of kicking back and enjoying a glass of fine Stardew Valley wine! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But there's no denying the benefit of kicking back and enjoying a glass of fine Stardew Valley wine!

Entries.DialogueText: I've been working on an 'animal checklist' for a few years now. I want to observe every species living in the valley!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been working on an 'animal checklist' for a few years now. I want to observe every species living in the valley!

Entries.DialogueText: I tried making my own pickles one time... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I tried making my own pickles one time...

Entries.DialogueText: Um, let me put it this way... The frogs we dissected in high school smelled like roses in comparison...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um, let me put it this way... The frogs we dissected in high school smelled like roses in comparison...

Entries.DialogueText: As a small town doctor, you can't help but form a personal connection with your patients. That can be both good and bad...
Entries.DisplayPattern: As a small town doctor, you can't help but form a personal connection with your patients. That can be both good and bad...

Entries.DialogueText: Well now that you know my secret, I might as well give you an update... I was significantly less winded after aerobics class this week!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well now that you know my secret, I might as well give you an update... I was significantly less winded after aerobics class this week!

Entries.DialogueText: I got such a good workout during aerobics class, I think I can treat myself to some pasta primavera tonight... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I got such a good workout during aerobics class, I think I can treat myself to some pasta primavera tonight...

Entries.DialogueText: I don't know why I was ashamed about being in dance aerobics class. My legs have become so strong, I should feel as bold as a lion!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't know why I was ashamed about being in dance aerobics class. My legs have become so strong, I should feel as bold as a lion!

Entries.DialogueText: I've never told anyone about my airplane hobby before... I guess I just feel comfortable talking to you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've never told anyone about my airplane hobby before... I guess I just feel comfortable talking to you.

Entries.DialogueText: As a doctor, you can only do so much to help your patients...
Entries.DisplayPattern: As a doctor, you can only do so much to help your patients...

Entries.DialogueText: I've made the mistake of getting too emotionally involved in the past... I won't let that happen again... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've made the mistake of getting too emotionally involved in the past... I won't let that happen again...

Entries.DialogueText: I've never felt like this before... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've never felt like this before...

Entries.DialogueText: I've been thinking about you so much, I can hardly do my work. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been thinking about you so much, I can hardly do my work.

Entries.DialogueText: Maru's been unusually cheerful lately... I hear you may have something to do with that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maru's been unusually cheerful lately... I hear you may have something to do with that.

Entries.DialogueText: Congratulations on your marriage, {Farmer_Name}. Maru's already informed me that she'll continue to work at the clinic, which is a relief!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Congratulations on your marriage, . Maru's already informed me that she'll continue to work at the clinic, which is a relief!

Entries.DialogueText: This is the happiest moment of my life... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is the happiest moment of my life...

Entries.DialogueText: Sunscreen? Check...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sunscreen? Check...

Entries.DialogueText: Sun hat? Check...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sun hat? Check...

Entries.DialogueText: If you get burnt, a little aloe vera cream might help soothe the skin.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you get burnt, a little aloe vera cream might help soothe the skin.

Entries.DialogueText: I combed the whole beach for glass. We wouldn't want anyone to get a cut on their foot!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I combed the whole beach for glass. We wouldn't want anyone to get a cut on their foot!

Entries.DialogueText: It's nice to have an opportunity to relax now and then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's nice to have an opportunity to relax now and then.

Entries.DialogueText: The trouble is actually letting go of your worries... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The trouble is actually letting go of your worries...

Entries.DialogueText: It's important to stay hydrated in this heat. I'm going to ask Gus if he has any coconut water! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's important to stay hydrated in this heat. I'm going to ask Gus if he has any coconut water!

Entries.DialogueText: I'll let you in on a little secret... I can only swim with floaties. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll let you in on a little secret... I can only swim with floaties.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been looking forward to it all afternoon! You look radiant in the fresh spring air, my love. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been looking forward to it all afternoon! You look radiant in the fresh spring air, my love.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! I'm sorry... I, er... have plans to ask someone else. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! I'm sorry... I, er... have plans to ask someone else.

Entries.DialogueText: I... I can't look at you. Please spare me any more pain. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I... I can't look at you. Please spare me any more pain.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Y...You...? {Portrait:Sad}
*gulp*... I... I think I'm going to be sick... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gulp*... I... I think I'm going to be sick...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm busy with my work. I can't speak to you. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm busy with my work. I can't speak to you.

Entries.DialogueText: I want you back in my life, {Farmer_Name}. I'm willing to forget what happened. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I want you back in my life, . I'm willing to forget what happened.

Entries.DialogueText: We sell a few over-the-counter medicines at the clinic... feel free to stop by if you're feeling exhausted.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We sell a few over-the-counter medicines at the clinic... feel free to stop by if you're feeling exhausted.

Entries.DialogueText: I know that being a farmer is pretty tiring work... don't overdo it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know that being a farmer is pretty tiring work... don't overdo it!

Entries.DialogueText: I feel responsible for the health of this whole community... it's kind of stressful.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel responsible for the health of this whole community... it's kind of stressful.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a pretty small community, and I'm fortunate to be able to build a good relationship with my patients.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a pretty small community, and I'm fortunate to be able to build a good relationship with my patients.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd like to stay in Stardew Valley for a while. I'm finally starting to feel involved in the community.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd like to stay in Stardew Valley for a while. I'm finally starting to feel involved in the community.

Entries.DialogueText: It feels good to know that you're useful.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It feels good to know that you're useful.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Hi, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Hi, .

Entries.DialogueText: Do you... have any medical questions? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you... have any medical questions?

Entries.DialogueText: Feel free to stop by my office if you're ever feeling ill.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Feel free to stop by my office if you're ever feeling ill.

Entries.DialogueText: You're young, though. You'll probably stay healthy without trying. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're young, though. You'll probably stay healthy without trying.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't overwork yourself, {Farmer_Name}. Doctor's orders!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't overwork yourself, . Doctor's orders!

Entries.DialogueText: If our farmers get sick, where will we get our food? We need you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If our farmers get sick, where will we get our food? We need you!

Entries.DialogueText: Don't overwork yourself, {Farmer_Name}. Doctor's orders!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't overwork yourself, . Doctor's orders!

Entries.DialogueText: Your health is important to me. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your health is important to me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd like to get to know you better, {Farmer_Name}. Let's put aside our doctor-patient relationship.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd like to get to know you better, . Let's put aside our doctor-patient relationship.

Entries.DialogueText: It's nice to have a friend in town. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's nice to have a friend in town.

Entries.DialogueText: You have a really healthy glow. That's good. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You have a really healthy glow. That's good.

Entries.DialogueText: Remember to cover your mouth when you sneeze.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Remember to cover your mouth when you sneeze.

Entries.DialogueText: Then make sure to wash your hands.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Then make sure to wash your hands.

Entries.DialogueText: As a doctor, I'm well aware of the benefits of home-cooked food. But I'm so busy, I have a hard time bringing myself to cook. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: As a doctor, I'm well aware of the benefits of home-cooked food. But I'm so busy, I have a hard time bringing myself to cook.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a lot of work, being a doctor. I don't eat as well as I should. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a lot of work, being a doctor. I don't eat as well as I should.

Entries.DialogueText: If I didn't live alone I think it would be easier. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I didn't live alone I think it would be easier.

Entries.DialogueText: Nutrition is important, so make sure and eat well. Try to increase your vegetable intake!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nutrition is important, so make sure and eat well. Try to increase your vegetable intake!

Entries.DialogueText: Home-cooked meals are best. Do you cook?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Home-cooked meals are best. Do you cook?

Entries.DialogueText: It's a beautiful day, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a beautiful day, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I wish I had less work to do. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish I had less work to do.

Entries.DialogueText: If you want to hang out in my apartment, that's okay with me. I live above the clinic.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you want to hang out in my apartment, that's okay with me. I live above the clinic.

Entries.DialogueText: Stop by my place if you ever need a confidential check-up. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stop by my place if you ever need a confidential check-up.

Entries.DialogueText: Can I do anything for you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can I do anything for you?

Entries.DialogueText: Take care.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Take care.

Entries.DialogueText: I came here because I liked the small-town atmosphere, and the potential for a holistic approach to patient care.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I came here because I liked the small-town atmosphere, and the potential for a holistic approach to patient care.

Entries.DialogueText: I've grown to really love it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've grown to really love it.

Entries.DialogueText: *Sigh*... I'm starting to feel kind of old...
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Sigh*... I'm starting to feel kind of old...

Entries.DialogueText: The older you get the more memories you're burdened with. It can be overwhelming. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The older you get the more memories you're burdened with. It can be overwhelming.

Entries.DialogueText: I think I'll stay younger with you around. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I'll stay younger with you around.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... I'm struggling to make ends meet. I don't have enough patients.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... I'm struggling to make ends meet. I don't have enough patients.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I should try to get patients from the neighboring towns...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I should try to get patients from the neighboring towns...

Entries.DialogueText: Imagine having a patient's life completely in your hands, and failing to keep them alive... that's something that will haunt you forever. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Imagine having a patient's life completely in your hands, and failing to keep them alive... that's something that will haunt you forever.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, .

Entries.DialogueText: You see, George, I'm just trying to help you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see, George, I'm just trying to help you.

Entries.DialogueText: *Sigh* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: Look, George. If you want to behave like this I'm going to have to tell your wife. I don't think she'll be happy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Look, George. If you want to behave like this I'm going to have to tell your wife. I don't think she'll be happy.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, {Farmer_Name}. I appreciate that. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, . I appreciate that.

Entries.DialogueText: *Sigh*... rude. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Sigh*... rude.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Hospitals make you nervous, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Hospitals make you nervous, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Just try and relax. I'm here to help. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just try and relax. I'm here to help.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay. That makes sense.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay. That makes sense.

Entries.DialogueText: Um. Okay... If you say so. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um. Okay... If you say so.

Entries.DialogueText: ...You're right.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...You're right.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: It's okay to get a moderate amount of sunlight. Just don't get burnt.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's okay to get a moderate amount of sunlight. Just don't get burnt.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay. Take care! Stay healthy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay. Take care! Stay healthy.

Entries.DialogueText: Exercise is important, but don't get too exhausted, or you might end up at my clinic!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Exercise is important, but don't get too exhausted, or you might end up at my clinic!

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure and listen to your body.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure and listen to your body.

Entries.DialogueText: People don't get sick much during the summer. That's nice, but it also means less business for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: People don't get sick much during the summer. That's nice, but it also means less business for me.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you been going into the mines, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you been going into the mines, ?

Entries.DialogueText: It's a dangerous place. I recommend against it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a dangerous place. I recommend against it.

Entries.DialogueText: When you eat certain foods you'll perform better.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When you eat certain foods you'll perform better.

Entries.DialogueText: Eating a 'Farmer's Lunch' will give you the nutrition you need to water and harvest crops better!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Eating a 'Farmer's Lunch' will give you the nutrition you need to water and harvest crops better!

Entries.DialogueText: It's flu season, so you'd better be extra careful.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's flu season, so you'd better be extra careful.

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure to wash your hands often.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure to wash your hands often.

Entries.DialogueText: I hate to say this, but I do make a lot more money during flu season.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hate to say this, but I do make a lot more money during flu season.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess if people stopped getting sick, I'd be out of business.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess if people stopped getting sick, I'd be out of business.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't get the wrong idea! I want people to be healthy... really!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't get the wrong idea! I want people to be healthy... really!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh my goodness! I have so much to prepare before the wedding! I'm nervous. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh my goodness! I have so much to prepare before the wedding! I'm nervous.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be relieved after we're all settled in on your farm. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be relieved after we're all settled in on your farm.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm really happy. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm really happy.

Entries.DialogueText: This was always my secret wish. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This was always my secret wish.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Do you still love me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Do you still love me?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you still happy with me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you still happy with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever wonder what else is out there? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?

Entries.DialogueText: You used to be romantic... what happened? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You used to be romantic... what happened?

Entries.DialogueText: I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?

Entries.DialogueText: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?

Entries.DialogueText: I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.

Entries.DialogueText: You've been so cold to me lately... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been so cold to me lately...

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if I could've done better. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if I could've done better.

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure and diversify your harvests this fall, my dear.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure and diversify your harvests this fall, my dear.

Entries.DialogueText: Or just grow cranberries... It's really up to you. What do I know?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Or just grow cranberries... It's really up to you. What do I know?

Entries.DialogueText: Tomorrow's the fair. The food is very rich and salty, but I'm fine with splurging once in a while. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Tomorrow's the fair. The food is very rich and salty, but I'm fine with splurging once in a while.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll admit, the spirit's eve festival usually gives me intestinal pain... but I'll do my best to be brave.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll admit, the spirit's eve festival usually gives me intestinal pain... but I'll do my best to be brave.

Entries.DialogueText: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.

Entries.DialogueText: I could sure go for some wine.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I could sure go for some wine.

Entries.DialogueText: I think I'll take a little walk today. I need to unwind.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I'll take a little walk today. I need to unwind.

Entries.DialogueText: I had a nice day. It's refreshing to spend some time alone now and then. Did you have a good day, honey?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had a nice day. It's refreshing to spend some time alone now and then. Did you have a good day, honey?

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}...I still can't believe we're married... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I still can't believe we're married...

Entries.DialogueText: You rescued me from a life of loneliness, and filled the emptiness in my heart. Thank you. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You rescued me from a life of loneliness, and filled the emptiness in my heart. Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here...

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, my... you look beautiful today. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, my... you look beautiful today.

Entries.DialogueText: This place is my home now... I'm happy here. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This place is my home now... I'm happy here.

Entries.DialogueText: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is flawless. It must have cost you a fortune! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is flawless. It must have cost you a fortune!

Entries.DialogueText: Be careful out there! I have nightmares about your limp body being wheeled into the emergency room. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Be careful out there! I have nightmares about your limp body being wheeled into the emergency room.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a simple life, but I like it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a simple life, but I like it.

Entries.DialogueText: I think we're all striving to reach some kind of balance in life. An equilibrium of complexity.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think we're all striving to reach some kind of balance in life. An equilibrium of complexity.

Entries.DialogueText: For me, moving here was exactly what my body needed to find that balance. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: For me, moving here was exactly what my body needed to find that balance.

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, {Farmer_Name}! I made you a nutritious breakfast.[201]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, ! I made you a nutritious breakfast.

Entries.DialogueText: Eggs are a good source of essential nutrients, so eat up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Eggs are a good source of essential nutrients, so eat up.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to study the medical literature today. It's important for me to keep up-to-date so I can give my patients the best care possible!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to study the medical literature today. It's important for me to keep up-to-date so I can give my patients the best care possible!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to listen to some jazz music and finalize my medical reports today. What do you have planned?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to listen to some jazz music and finalize my medical reports today. What do you have planned?

Entries.DialogueText: I was afraid of you when we first met. It's funny to think about now that we've come so far. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was afraid of you when we first met. It's funny to think about now that we've come so far.

Entries.DialogueText: The sky looks great today... so clear!
Entries.DisplayPattern: The sky looks great today... so clear!

Entries.DialogueText: From now on, I'm only going to go into the clinic when I have appointments. Otherwise I can just work from home!
Entries.DisplayPattern: From now on, I'm only going to go into the clinic when I have appointments. Otherwise I can just work from home!

Entries.DialogueText: You look exhausted, dear. Let me give you a massage tonight. I promise it will reduce the inflammation in your muscle tissue! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You look exhausted, dear. Let me give you a massage tonight. I promise it will reduce the inflammation in your muscle tissue!

Entries.DialogueText: I took it easy today... spent some time reading books, fiddled with my radio, and worked on a model airplane.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I took it easy today... spent some time reading books, fiddled with my radio, and worked on a model airplane.

Entries.DialogueText: It's important to take a day off now and then to relax... stress is unhealthy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's important to take a day off now and then to relax... stress is unhealthy.

Entries.DialogueText: Good evening... did you finish everything you needed to do today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good evening... did you finish everything you needed to do today?

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry about me. I'm very self-sufficient. If you have more work to do go right ahead.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry about me. I'm very self-sufficient. If you have more work to do go right ahead.

Entries.DialogueText: It's stressful to be a doctor, so it's really great to live somewhere as relaxing as %farm Farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's stressful to be a doctor, so it's really great to live somewhere as relaxing as Farm.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! I was just daydreaming about the circulatory system and forgot what I was trying to do. It's a classic doctor's problem.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! I was just daydreaming about the circulatory system and forgot what I was trying to do. It's a classic doctor's problem.

Entries.DialogueText: You look like you could use a good massage tonight. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You look like you could use a good massage tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: Doctor's orders... It's good for the circulation!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Doctor's orders... It's good for the circulation!

Entries.DialogueText: I have to go into the clinic today. Have a nice day, okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have to go into the clinic today. Have a nice day, okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, honey. How was your day?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, honey. How was your day?

Entries.DialogueText: $e
Entries.DisplayPattern: $e

Entries.DialogueText: *Phew*... I'm exhausted... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Phew*... I'm exhausted...

Entries.DialogueText: My patients are still healthy, so it was a good day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My patients are still healthy, so it was a good day.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?

Entries.DialogueText: Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...

Entries.DialogueText: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.

Entries.DialogueText: Are we doing okay on money, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are we doing okay on money, ?

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't really feel like doing anything today.

Entries.DialogueText: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess farms can be kind of dirty.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess farms can be kind of dirty.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?

Entries.DialogueText: Where am I supposed to sleep...? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Where am I supposed to sleep...?

Entries.DialogueText: I wasn't able to sleep well last night... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wasn't able to sleep well last night...

Entries.DialogueText: I had to sleep on the floor last night... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had to sleep on the floor last night...

Entries.DialogueText: Did something happen to our bed...? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did something happen to our bed...?

Entries.DialogueText: You and %kid1 are the most important parts of my life.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You and are the most important parts of my life.

Entries.DialogueText: Little %kid1 is going to have the perfect childhood here. We're really fortunate to have this opportunity.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Little is going to have the perfect childhood here. We're really fortunate to have this opportunity.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll feed %kid1 today. You can just focus on running the farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll feed today. You can just focus on running the farm.

Entries.DialogueText: So far, I really like being a father! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: So far, I really like being a father!

Entries.DialogueText: This is a very safe spot. You go on ahead and take care of business, don't worry about me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a very safe spot. You go on ahead and take care of business, don't worry about me.

Entries.DialogueText: I believe this must be the ideal place to raise children, scientifically. What do you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I believe this must be the ideal place to raise children, scientifically. What do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: I may not be the most exciting guy, but I'll stay loyal to you for the rest of my life. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I may not be the most exciting guy, but I'll stay loyal to you for the rest of my life.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}... you... you mean the world to me. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... you... you mean the world to me.

Entries.DialogueText: As a scientist I'm fascinated by the delicate interplay of insect and plant life.
Entries.DisplayPattern: As a scientist I'm fascinated by the delicate interplay of insect and plant life.

Entries.DialogueText: This is so much nicer than being cooped up in the clinic all day. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is so much nicer than being cooped up in the clinic all day.

Entries.DialogueText: I love watching you on the farm... hehe
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love watching you on the farm... hehe

Entries.DialogueText: You know, this 'journal of tendon dynamics' is actually bearable when I'm reading out here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, this 'journal of tendon dynamics' is actually bearable when I'm reading out here.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a myth that rainy weather causes the flu. However, take care that you don't slip on the mud!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a myth that rainy weather causes the flu. However, take care that you don't slip on the mud!

Entries.DialogueText: I often worry about you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I often worry about you.

Entries.DialogueText: It was so incredibly lonely living above the clinic by myself... I'm much happier now. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was so incredibly lonely living above the clinic by myself... I'm much happier now.

Entries.DialogueText: I woke up early, but I made sure not to wake you. You looked so peaceful.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I woke up early, but I made sure not to wake you. You looked so peaceful.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't mind the rain. Sure, I can't watch the planes go by, but I can still listen to the radio chatter.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't mind the rain. Sure, I can't watch the planes go by, but I can still listen to the radio chatter.

Entries.DialogueText: It makes the whole thing a little more mysterious.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It makes the whole thing a little more mysterious.

Entries.DialogueText: I have a backlog of house chores I want to complete today. I've got plenty to keep me busy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have a backlog of house chores I want to complete today. I've got plenty to keep me busy!

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure you stay dry today, dear. I don't want you to become hypothermic.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure you stay dry today, dear. I don't want you to become hypothermic.

Entries.DialogueText: How was your day, honey? I was going to do the dishes but I got absorbed in the latest issue of "Knee Surgery Enthusiast".
Entries.DisplayPattern: How was your day, honey? I was going to do the dishes but I got absorbed in the latest issue of "Knee Surgery Enthusiast".

Entries.DialogueText: If you're enjoying life, who cares if it's a little repetitive? That's what I say.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you're enjoying life, who cares if it's a little repetitive? That's what I say.

Entries.DialogueText: You look a little soggy, hun. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You look a little soggy, hun. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?

Entries.DialogueText: You look a little soggy, dear. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You look a little soggy, dear. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?

Entries.DialogueText: The sound of rain gives our minds something to focus on, so we're not distracted by random thoughts.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The sound of rain gives our minds something to focus on, so we're not distracted by random thoughts.

Entries.DialogueText: That's my theory for why it's so soothing...
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's my theory for why it's so soothing...

Entries.DialogueText: I made us a nice healthy dinner. Only fresh, wholesome ingredients from the valley! [212 214 225 209 200] {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I made us a nice healthy dinner. Only fresh, wholesome ingredients from the valley!

Entries.DialogueText: Just make sure to eat a reasonable portion, dear.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just make sure to eat a reasonable portion, dear.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to stay inside.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to stay inside.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. It's good to see you. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. It's good to see you.

Entries.DialogueText: I spent the day skimming through some medical journals.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I spent the day skimming through some medical journals.

Entries.DialogueText: No air-traffic this morning, honey. But it's still fun to break out the equipment now and then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No air-traffic this morning, honey. But it's still fun to break out the equipment now and then.

Entries.DialogueText: $e
Entries.DisplayPattern: $e

Entries.DialogueText: I'm working on a new model plane. It's so much more relaxing here than in my old apartment.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm working on a new model plane. It's so much more relaxing here than in my old apartment.

Entries.DialogueText: It's wonderful to see all the plants return to life. The greenery is refreshing after a monochrome winter.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's wonderful to see all the plants return to life. The greenery is refreshing after a monochrome winter.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, it's a festival tomorrow, isn't it? Large crowds, activities... *gulp* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, it's a festival tomorrow, isn't it? Large crowds, activities... *gulp*

Entries.DialogueText: W...Will you dance with me at the festival tomorrow? {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: W...Will you dance with me at the festival tomorrow?

Entries.DialogueText: It's always a little embarrassing. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's always a little embarrassing.

Entries.DialogueText: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of productive weather to look forward to.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of productive weather to look forward to.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's plant some healthy vegetables this spring. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's plant some healthy vegetables this spring.

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, dear! It's very dangerous for your skin. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, dear! It's very dangerous for your skin.

Entries.DialogueText: As your husband and doctor, I consider your health and safety my top priority!
Entries.DisplayPattern: As your husband and doctor, I consider your health and safety my top priority!

Entries.DialogueText: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?

Entries.DialogueText: I would put an item of high value and quality. We all want to leave a great impression on the governor!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I would put an item of high value and quality. We all want to leave a great impression on the governor!

Entries.DialogueText: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll take care of them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll take care of them.

Entries.DialogueText: As summer draws to a close, and the colder season begins, my workload tends to increase. Sorry in advance if I'm a little moody...
Entries.DisplayPattern: As summer draws to a close, and the colder season begins, my workload tends to increase. Sorry in advance if I'm a little moody...

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry if I smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry if I smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, honey... That can really damage your skin.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, honey... That can really damage your skin.

Entries.DialogueText: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their breakfasts. I'm trying to teach them to enjoy healthy food!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I already gave and their breakfasts. I'm trying to teach them to enjoy healthy food!

Entries.DialogueText: I believe a child should be allowed to play and explore to their heart's content. You're only a kid once.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I believe a child should be allowed to play and explore to their heart's content. You're only a kid once.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe %kid2 will grow up to become a pilot, like I never could?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe will grow up to become a pilot, like I never could?

Entries.DialogueText: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I had nightmares of being a bachelor forever.... I love you so much.

Entries.DisplayPattern: The air is very dry during winter. That's why our skin tends to become irritated.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll rub a little truffle oil onto your back every night. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll rub a little truffle oil onto your back every night.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, here's to a fantastic year. I have complete confidence that next year will be even better! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, here's to a fantastic year. I have complete confidence that next year will be even better!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Are we going to stop by the ice festival tomorrow? I do enjoy the igloos...

Entries.DisplayPattern: So, tell me about your day...

Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't want to see you on the operating table anytime soon...

Entries.DisplayPattern: Although I have to say, I like how courageous you are...

Entries.DisplayPattern: A peaceful day by the water, huh? That sounds very relaxing.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you're having fun out there!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, that's good. Having an active social life is healthy for the brain.

Entries.DisplayPattern: But remember, I'm always here for you if you need someone to talk to!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Took the day off, huh? I'm glad to hear it.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, with a day off and a hearty dinner you'll be fully re-charged for tomorrow.

Entries.DialogueText: Whew... I'm stuffed! That was great...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whew... I'm stuffed! That was great...

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll take care of the dishes...

Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't feel bad... I like to do nice things for you! It makes me happy.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I know I say this a lot, but... marrying you was the best thing that ever happened to me!

Entries.DisplayPattern: George, I'll be honest with you. You need to make some changes in your lifestyle if you want to stay healthy.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd like you to reduce your sodium intake, and try to get some moderate exercise with your arms.

Entries.DisplayPattern: And I went to school for 8 years so I could learn how to help people stay healthy.

Entries.DialogueText: Pretend like everything's normal.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, well... You see, I was just on my radio here... and I made contact with a real pilot!

Entries.DialogueText: Quick, get over here!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Quick, get over here!

Entries.DialogueText: Look!

Entries.DialogueText: As a kid, my dream was always to be a pilot.
Entries.DisplayPattern: As a kid, my dream was always to be a pilot.

Entries.DialogueText: ...But with my bad eyesight and a crippling fear of heights, that dream started to fade away. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But with my bad eyesight and a crippling fear of heights, that dream started to fade away.

Entries.DialogueText: It's okay... don't be sad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's okay... don't be sad.

Entries.DialogueText: I've grown to accept my station in life. Not everyone can achieve their dreams... that's just the way the world is.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've grown to accept my station in life. Not everyone can achieve their dreams... that's just the way the world is.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh dear... I've got sand in my socks...

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm thankful there were no medical emergencies this year!

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm feeling a little overwhelmed... thank goodness for this crisp air...

Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you tried the pecan pie? It's my favorite.

Entries.DialogueText: But ultimately, I'm most thankful for the life we're building together... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But ultimately, I'm most thankful for the life we're building together...
